page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Last summer I went to{Birkenhead}for the day with my family. We went by car using one of the{Mersey Tunnels.}When we arrived we went straight to the amusement arcade. We played on all types of games including the{fruit {machines}and while we played my mum and dad went to the pub for a drink. We bought chips and drinks from a chip shop for our dinner and ate them sitting on a bench by the sea. Later we went down to the beach to look for crabs and mussels. We found lots of mussels which we put in a bag and later took home. We brushed all the sand off our feet and clothes before getting into the car to go home. We arrived home, had something to eat and watched television. I enjoyed that day out. Michelle Hardaker aged 11.
